data.name: AMA Chunk 1: Email to Staging (Document Organizer V4)

nodes.name: Gmail Trigger
nodes.notes: DEPRECATED V4: Old Gmail polling trigger. Replaced by Execute Workflow Trigger from Pre-Chunk 0. Kept for rollback capability only.

nodes.name: Normalize Email Data
nodes.notes: V4: Normalizes email data with consistent field names.

nodes.name: IF Has Attachments
nodes.notes: Routes emails with attachments for processing.

nodes.name: Extract Attachments
nodes.notes: V4: Extracts attachments with normalized field names.

nodes.name: Filter Supported Files
nodes.notes: Only processes PDF and ZIP files. Other types are logged and skipped.

nodes.name: Sequential Processing
nodes.notes: V4 FIX: Processes documents ONE AT A TIME to prevent race conditions.

nodes.name: IF ZIP File
nodes.notes: Routes ZIP files for extraction.

nodes.name: Extract ZIP
nodes.notes: Extracts all files from ZIP archive.

nodes.name: Normalize ZIP Contents
nodes.notes: V4: Normalizes extracted files with consistent field names.

parameters.jsCode:
// V4: Simple pass-through - no node references
return $input.all();

nodes.name: Merge File Streams
nodes.notes: Combines direct PDFs and extracted PDFs into single stream.

nodes.name: Upload to Staging
nodes.notes: Uploads file to staging folder for processing.

nodes.name: Normalize Output
nodes.notes: V4: Ensures consistent field names for Chunk 2.

nodes.name: Receive from Pre-Chunk 0
nodes.notes: V4: Receives file_id, client_normalized, and staging_folder_id from Pre-Chunk 0

nodes.name: Get Gmail Message
nodes.notes: V4: Fetches specific email by ID from Pre-Chunk 0 with attachments downloaded

nodes.name: Merge Parameters
nodes.notes: V4: Combines email data with Pre-Chunk 0 parameters (client_normalized + staging_folder_id)

nodes.name: Move File to Staging
nodes.notes: V4: Moves file from temp folder (1ikw3k-EgpVg_h2ySDdqdUFB7-FQyYDFm) to staging_folder_id
